marklogic.body:
Paige, to be brief:
Amun, aka Quetzalcoatl and being one of the various gods of winds, was displeased with the fingernail polish of our Panther so (being an Old Testament kinda guy) used a door as an instrument of guidance. This was after Nemesis tried to teach her a lesson for being a lawyer with a Toothache; apparently that counts as an Act of hubris, the primary of the seven deadly sins, one which I seem to commit at least on a weekly basis.
I sincerely hope she's keeping her toes up to standard, no telling who's in charge of infractions of those digits. The panoply of Old Time Religion is something I prefer not to trifle with.
